verbs.description: [ARG0: A very envious Donald Trump] [V: wants] [ARG1: an Executive Order to personally punish Amazon 's CEO and the USPS] . Meanwhile , his ' job creator ' Republican Party is silent on this dangerous trend towards dictatorial rule .

A very envious Donald Trump wants [ARG0: an Executive Order] to [ARGM-MNR: personally] [V: punish] [ARG1: Amazon 's CEO and the USPS] . Meanwhile , his ' job creator ' Republican Party is silent on this dangerous trend towards dictatorial rule .

A very envious Donald Trump wants an Executive Order to personally punish Amazon 's CEO and the USPS . [ARGM-TMP: Meanwhile] , [ARG1: his ' job creator ' Republican Party] [V: is] [ARG2: silent on this dangerous trend towards dictatorial rule] .
